name: Reuniclus
flavorText:
When Reuniclus shake hands, a network
forms between their brains, increasing
their psychic power.

previous.name: Duosion
previous.flavorText:
Since they have two divided brains,
at times they suddenly try to take two
different actions at once.

next.name: Ducklett
next.flavorText:
These bird Pokémon are excellent divers.
They swim around in the water eating
their favorite food--peat moss.

pokemon.name: Solosis
pokemon.flavorText:
They drive away attackers by unleashing
psychic power. They can use telepathy
to talk with others.

different actions at once.
